attributes.action: Reject calls for a 2nd EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details: The campaigns were well fought and the people got enough information from both sides and made there choice, stick with it.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call upon HM Government to reject undemocratic calls to hold a 2nd EU Referendum.

The people have spoken and those who didn't get the result they desired wish to overturn the majority's decision by calling for more Referendums until they get the desired result they want.
